View Javadoc
1   package com.test.vendor.hsqldb;
2   
3   import com.test.AbstractTestSuite;
4   import org.hibernate.cfg.JdbcSettings;
5   import spring.SpringTargetApplication;
6   
7   public abstract class ConcreteHsqldbSuiteIT extends AbstractTestSuite {
8   
9       public ConcreteHsqldbSuiteIT() {
10  
11          this.jdbcURL = SpringTargetApplication.propsHsqldb.getProperty(JdbcSettings.JAKARTA_JDBC_URL);
12          this.jdbcUser = SpringTargetApplication.propsHsqldb.getProperty(JdbcSettings.JAKARTA_JDBC_USER);
13          this.jdbcPass = SpringTargetApplication.propsHsqldb.getProperty(JdbcSettings.JAKARTA_JDBC_PASSWORD);
14  
15          this.jsqlDatabaseName = "PUBLIC";
16          this.jsqlTableName = "STUDENT";
17          this.jsqlColumnName = "STUDENT_ID";
18          
19          this.jdbcColumnForDatabaseName = "schema_name";
20          this.jdbcColumnForTableName = "TABLE_NAME";
21          this.jdbcColumnForColumnName = "COLUMN_NAME";
22  
23          this.jdbcQueryForDatabaseNames = "select distinct schema_name from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.tables t right join INFORMATION_SCHEMA.schemata s on t.TABLE_SCHEMA = s.schema_name";
24          this.jdbcQueryForTableNames =    "select TABLE_NAME from information_schema.tables where TABLE_SCHEMA = '"+ this.jsqlDatabaseName +"'";
25          this.jdbcQueryForColumnNames =   "select COLUMN_NAME from information_schema.columns where TABLE_SCHEMA='"+ this.jsqlDatabaseName +"' and TABLE_NAME='"+ this.jsqlTableName +"'";
26          this.jdbcQueryForValues =    "select "+ this.jsqlColumnName +" from "+ this.jsqlDatabaseName +"."+ this.jsqlTableName;
27      }
28  }
